result.arabic_text: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ
result.translation: 16. Kaadu tonnaah, tama suurak naharsi aayootay Yallih dudda tascasse kah oobisnennah, nanu Qhuraan oobisneh Aayoota kaak baxxaqqa axcuk, kaadu diggah Yalli ama aayootal isih faxa mara tirri haa, kaak sa sinam tirri haytam matan.
